channel.title: Halo3 Public Beta!
channel.description:
:eek:
Microsoft is giving Halo fans everywhere an early glimpse at Halo 3 when it opens up a public beta for the multiplayer mode over Xbox Live this spring. Also whetting the whistle was a commercial for Halo 3 shown during Monday Night Football game on ESPN. The company also announced that it will release new multiplayer maps for Halo 2 this spring. Unlike previous maps, however, these will only be available via download on Xbox Live, and they will only play on a 360.

item.title: Halo3 Public Beta!
item.dc:creator: @g00dg0d g00dg0d

@g00dg0d wrote:

Lol No one cares about a shirt you saw. If it took you that long to find out there was going to be a Halo 3 then your a retard. Unless it said HALO 3: BETA RELEASE no one cares.
